LanguageData.BuildLMG.label: 제작 : L-15 LMG (중화기)
LanguageData.BuildLMG.description: Builds the L-15 LMG for personal defense. As a portable light machine gun the L-15 is heavy to carry around but is capable of providing 15-점사s for suppressing fire.\n구경 : 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildM56_USCM.label: 제작 : M56 스마트 총 (중화기)
LanguageData.BuildM56_USCM.description: The M56 스마트 총 is a portable heavy machine gun with automatic targeting capabilities.\n구경 : .50 BMG
LanguageData.BuildMinigun.label: 제작 : XM214 마이크로 총 (중화기)
LanguageData.BuildMinigun.description: Builds the XM214 마이크로 총, which is a multi-barrel machine gun with an extremely high rate of fire.\n구경 : 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildIncendiaryLauncher.label: 제작 : RL T9 화염 방사기 (중화기)
LanguageData.BuildIncendiaryLauncher.description: Builds the RL T9 화염 방사기, an incendiary bolt launcher that is capable of starting fires from a distance.\n구경 : 30x64mm Fuel cell
LanguageData.BuildIncendiaryLauncher.jobString: 제작 중 : RL T9 화염 방사기.
LanguageData.BuildGalilBurstRifle.label: 제작 : RPK-74 (중화기)
LanguageData.BuildGalilBurstRifle.description: Builds the RPK-47, an ancient pattern military 소총. Fires an 8-점사. Good range, low power and high rate of fire.\n구경 : 7.62x39mm Soviet
LanguageData.BuildHeavyCombatRifle.label: 제작 : MA39X ICWS (중화기)
LanguageData.BuildHeavyCombatRifle.description: Builds the MA39X Individual Combat Weapon 시스템, a close combat service 소총 of the UNSC. Fires a 12-점사 with average medium range accuracy.\n구경 : 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildMilkorGrenadeLauncher.label: 제작 : 밀코어 MGL (중화기)
LanguageData.BuildMilkorGrenadeLauncher.description: Builds the 밀코어 MGL (multiple grenade launcher), a launcher-type weapon that fires 수류탄 at a higher rate than a human could.\n구경 : 40x46mm Grenade
LanguageData.BuildM249.label: 제작 : M249 LMG 기관총 (중화기)
LanguageData.BuildM249.description: Builds the M249 LMG 기관총, a heavy machinegun. It has a 120 round magazine and fires in 20 점사s. Not very accurate but good at providing suppressing fire.\n구경 : 5.56x45mm NATO
